sentences.en: a slice of apple pie
a slice of bread
a slice of melon
a thick slice of bread
Bess stabbed a slice of cucumber.
Cut the tomatoes into slices .
Cut the tomatoes into slices.
Everybody wants a slice of the profits.
sentences.cn: 这利润每个人都想分一杯羹。

sentences.en: Fiction takes up a large slice of the publishing market.
sentences.cn: 小说在出版市场上占了很大的份额。

sentences.en: Finely slice the cooking apples.
sentences.cn: 把烹调用的苹果切成薄片。

sentences.en: For breakfast I had a thick slice of bread and syrup.
sentences.cn: 早餐我吃了一片厚厚的涂了糖浆的面包。

sentences.en: He cut me off a slice.
It's best to slice into a rich cake from the middle.
sentences.cn: 最好把甜美的蛋糕从中间切开.

sentences.en: Marina ate only one slice of bread.
sentences.cn: 玛丽娜只吃了一片面包。

sentences.en: Peel and thinly slice the onion.
sentences.cn: 剥掉洋葱皮，然后切成薄片。

sentences.en: pizza slices
Rinse and slice the cour-gettes crosswise.
sentences.cn: 将西葫芦洗干净，斜着切成片。

sentences.en: Slice the meat thickly.
Slice up the onions and add them to the meat.
sentences.cn: 把洋葱切成片，然后加到肉里。

sentences.en: sliced ham
They wanted to make sure they got a slice of the profits.
sentences.cn: 他们想确保自己可得到一份利润.

sentences.en: Thinly slice the cucumbers.

words.tran_cn: 切断，切片；限制，[电子] 限幅
切成薄片；分配（slice的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 见piece 条 a piece of the action
（电影、戏剧或书中）现实生活的真实片断
时间片；时间片段；时间区分

trans.tran_en: a thin flat piece of food cut from a larger piece

trans.tran_cn: 将…切成薄片，切开，曲打，打出弧线球，大量降低
trans.tran_en: to cut meat, bread, vegetables etc into thin flat pieces
to cut meat, bread, vegetables etc into thin flat pieces
